purpose: Provide example implementations and best practices for building serverless applications using AWS services.
principle: Demonstrates the use of AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and other serverless technologies to create scalable applications.
reusability: The samples can be reused as templates for building serverless applications, with customizable components for various use cases.
limitations: Primarily focused on AWS services; may require adaptation for other cloud providers.
name: serverless-samples
description: This repository contains samples of Serverless application code.
